page.title: 15GAMES CHILDREN PLAY 1/2
page.content:
This is a list of games children play on this Isle.We split the list into the types of games. { { BALL GAMES Dodge ball ,Football,Pass,Netball, } Piggy in the middle,Plainies Clappies,
{ SOMEBODYS IT GAMES Block,Free me,Stick in the mud,Dodge ball,Hide and seek,Sly Fox,British Bulldogs,Letters, Polo,Pop Stars, Aunties and Uncles,Catchies,Window Game,Black Jack,Whats the time Mr Wolf,Cling,Sardines. { { RUNNING GAMES Free me,Stick in the mud,Dodge Ball, British Bulldogs,Pop Stars,Polo, Catchies,Window Game. { }
